definitions.definition: an abnormal feature, characteristic, or occurrence, typically in a medical context.
the quality or state of being abnormal.
examples: unusualness, uncommonness, atypicality, irregularity, anomalousness, deviation, divergence, aberrance, aberration, freakishness; Morestrangeness, oddness, peculiarity, unexpectedness, singularity "the abnormality of such behavior"Morestrangeness, oddness, peculiarity, unexpectedness, singularity the abnormality of such behavior
